HCV diagnosis is a **input factor**. It means that it is one of the inputs from the user to the model.

#### Alternative names:
* HCV
* HCV diagnosis
* HCVStatus

#### Uses

HCV diagnosis is used by the model in the following places

* [Liver cancer](/model/LiverCancer)
* [Chronic liver disease](/model/Chronic_Liver_Disease)
* [Hepatitis](/model/Hepatitis)

#### Guidance

The user input is chosen from a list and should answer the question

> Are you infected with Hepatitis C?

The user has the following answer options

* Yes
* No


### Optimizability

[Optimizability](/model/optimizabilities) is a subjective measure used to describe how easy it is to optimize a certain factor of your life. The optimizability of HCV diagnosis is 2. This means that it can be interpreted as

> *It is impossible to change, but it could have been the consequence of your actions*
